abstract: Wesleyan University students Eric Lonergan, Andrew Olson, Zachary Kramer and Rama Agha Al Kakib are arrested and charged with obtaining, supplying and possession with intent to sell MDMA after several students are hospitalized for drug overdoses.
lead_paragraph: The students face charges that include illegal obtaining and supplying of drugs after the overdoses, which left a dozen people hospitalized over the weekend.

headline.main: 4 Wesleyan Students Arrested in On-Campus Overdoses

snippet: The students face charges that include illegal obtaining and supplying of drugs after the overdoses, which left a dozen people hospitalized over the weekend.
